description: Cipher Pol No. 9, a secret World Government intelligence agency with authority to kill in the name of 'Dark Justice'. The strongest and most ruthless of the Cipher Pol agencies.

keyMoments.title: CP9 Plans to Execute Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: CP9 reveals their intention to kill the Straw Hat Pirates using the loophole in their agreement with Robin.
keyMoments.significance: Shows CP9's ruthlessness and the World Government's duplicity.

keyMoments.title: Rob Lucci Reveals CP9's True Nature
keyMoments.description: Lucci reveals that CP9 members, particularly himself, are motivated by bloodlust and the freedom to kill with government sanction.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes CP9 as corrupt enforcers rather than true agents of justice.
